name: ls
title: list directory contents
description: List information about the FILEs (the current directory by default).
content: ls list directory contents files folders options all long format human readable

name: cd
title: change directory
description: Change the current directory to the specified path.
content: cd change directory navigate path folder home previous pwd

name: grep
title: print lines matching a pattern
description: Search for PATTERN in each FILE or standard input.
content: grep search pattern regex find match text files recursive case insensitive

name: find
title: search for files in a directory hierarchy
description: Search for files in a directory hierarchy based on various criteria.
content: find search locate files directories name type size modified exec

name: cat
title: concatenate files and print on the standard output
content: cat concatenate display print file contents combine append number lines

name: echo
title: display a line of text
description: Echo the STRING(s) to standard output.
content: echo print display output text string newline escape sequences

name: mkdir
title: make directories
description: Create the DIRECTORY(ies), if they do not already exist.
content: mkdir make create directory folder parents permissions recursive

name: rm
title: remove files or directories
content: rm remove delete unlink file directory recursive force interactive
